# textViewForBeginningOfSelection

**Instance Property**

The text view that contains the first glyph in the selection.

## Declaration

```swift
unowned(unsafe) var textViewForBeginningOfSelection: NSTextView? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property does not cause layout if the beginning of the selected range is not yet laid out.

## Managing the responder chain

- **layoutManagerOwnsFirstResponder(in:)**: Indicates whether the first responder in the specified window is a text view for the layout manager.
- **firstTextView**: The first text view in the layout manager’s series of text views.
